channel.title: phil1988/freedi
channel.description: An open OS + display firmware for QIDI 3D printers

item.title: FreeDi v1.40 released - Update instructions
item.description:
### v1.40 has just been released!
This update includes several "under the hood" changes that can't be updated through Moonraker Update Manager. I'm really sorry about this - unfortunately, thereâ€™s no other way, and I hope you understand. This update changes many things that you will not even notice, but it was needed to enable the desired features.
To take advantage of these, you can either flash the images from the release section or manually add the new features.
This is a How-To for all of you curr...
